markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Trollhound Vest](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1854)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 19 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 230 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Hide Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=7)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This suit of _+1 [hide armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=7)_ is sickly green and covered in thick warts and nodules, fashioned from the hide of a [trollhound](/Monsters.aspx?ID=835) and imbued with some of the beast's vitality. Wearing this armor gives you a –1 circumstance penalty to all checks made using [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) to interact with [trolls](/Monsters.aspx?ID=395) and a +1 circumstance bonus to Diplomacy checks used to [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50) in communities traditionally plagued by troll attacks.

<document level="2" id="action-1551" />

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include the hides of at least two trollhounds.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Trollhound Vest
